2173.subject: BUS
2173.descrlong:
Bus Analytics (BA) uses technology to collect & analyze complex information for an organization for data-driven decision making. BA supports strategic & operational decision making by improving performance, optimizing customer relations, & monitoring business activity. Provides understanding of concepts of BA capabilities using data visualization, decision support systems (DSS), ethics & other topics. (In-class, hybrid, or online format).

[(Prereq or Coreq: BUS 308) and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
